title: Web Start applications
extract: Running a Java Web Start Application From a Browser. You can run a Java Web Start application from a browser by clicking a link to the application's JNLP file. The following text is an example of a link to a JNLP file. Java Web Start software loads and runs the application based on instructions in the JNLP file.
extract_html: Running a Java Web Start Application From a Browser. You can run a Java Web Start application from a browser by clicking a link to the application's JNLP file. The following text is an example of a link to a JNLP file. Java Web Start software loads and runs the application based on instructions in the JNLP file.
